languages.text: "Не суди его строго, Вольный Торговец. Мне еще не встречался мон-кай, способный противостоять силе моего убеждения". {n}Из-под шлема доносится хищный смешок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не суди его строго, Вольный Торговец. Мне еще не встречался мон-кай, способный противостоять силе моего убеждения". {n}Из под шлема доносится хищный смешок.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Do not judge him so harshly, Rogue Trader. I have yet to meet a mon-keigh who can resist my powers of persuasion." {n}You hear a predatory laugh from inside the helmet.{/n}

languages.text: « Ne le jugez pas trop sévèrement, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je n'ai encore jamais rencontré de mon-keigh capable de résister à mes talents de persuasion. » {n}Un rire carnassier se fait entendre à l'intérieur du casque.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not judge him so harshly, Rogue Trader. I have yet to meet a mon-keigh who can resist my powers of persuasion." {n}You hear a predatory laugh from inside the helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ne le jugez pas trop sévèrement, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je n'ai encore jamais rencontré de mon-keigh capable de résister à mes talents de persuasion. » {n}Un rire carnassier se fait entendre à l'intérieur du casque.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: “别这么苛刻地评判他嘛，行商浪人。到目前为止，我还没见过我无法说服的人呢。”{n}你听到玛拉斋的头盔里传来了充满掠夺意味的笑声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not judge him so harshly, Rogue Trader. I have yet to meet a mon-keigh who can resist my powers of persuasion." {n}You hear a predatory laugh from inside the helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “别这么苛刻地评判他嘛，行商浪人。到目前为止，我还没见过我无法说服的人呢。”{n}你听到玛拉斋的头盔里传来了充满掠夺意味的笑声。{/n}
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、そんなに奴を責めてやるな。俺の説得に抵抗できるモン＝ケイなど、俺自身まだ会ったことがないのだからな」{n}ヘルメットの中から肉食獣のような笑い声が聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not judge him so harshly, Rogue Trader. I have yet to meet a mon-keigh who can resist my powers of persuasion." {n}You hear a predatory laugh from inside the helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ、そんなに奴を責めてやるな。俺の説得に抵抗できるモン＝ケイなど、俺自身まだ会ったことがないのだからな」{n}ヘルメットの中から肉食獣のような笑い声が聞こえる。{/n}
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Richtet nicht so hart über ihn, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich habe noch einen Chem-Pan-Sey erlebt, der sicher meiner Überzeugungskraft widersetzen konnte." {n}Aus dem Helminneren ertönt ein raubtierartiges Gelächter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not judge him so harshly, Rogue Trader. I have yet to meet a mon-keigh who can resist my powers of persuasion." {n}You hear a predatory laugh from inside the helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Richtet nicht so hart über ihn, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich habe noch einen Che-Pan-Sey erlebt, der sicher meiner Überzeugungskraft widersetzen konnte." {n}Aus dem Helminneren ertönt ein raubtierartiges Gelächter.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: «No seas tan {mf|duro|dura} con él, Comerciante Independiente. Aún no he conocido ningún mon-keigh capaz de resistirse a mis poderes de persuasión». {n}Oyes su risa cruel desde debajo del casco.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not judge him so harshly, Rogue Trader. I have yet to meet a mon-keigh who can resist my powers of persuasion." {n}You hear a predatory laugh from inside the helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No seas tan {mf|duro|dura} con él, Comerciante Independiente. Aún no he conocido ningún mon-keigh capaz de resistirse a mis poderes de persuasión». {n}Oyes su risa cruel desde debajo del casco.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Hüküm verirken o kadar sert davranma Hür Tacir. İkna kabiliyetime karşı koyabilecek mon-keigh daha anasının karnından doğmadı." {n}Miğferin içinden vahşi bir kahkaha duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not judge him so harshly, Rogue Trader. I have yet to meet a mon-keigh who can resist my powers of persuasion." {n}You hear a predatory laugh from inside the helmet.{/n}
